meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by petechiae.
meanings.sent1: The doctor noticed the petechial spots on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: Her face had a petechial appearance due to the small red dots.
meanings.sent3: The petechial pattern on the fabric made it look like a tiny constellation.
meanings.sent4: The petechial marks on the map indicated areas of high population density.
meanings.sent5: The petechial rash was a vivid reminder of the illness.

meanings.sent1: The painting had a petechial texture, with tiny specks of color throughout.
meanings.sent2: The petechial design on the dress mimicked the look of scattered dots.
meanings.sent3: The petechial pattern on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her petechial necklace added a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The petechial pattern on the wallpaper gave the room a distinct charm.
